TopicTitle: my forum icon wont show up.

Articles.Content: been having this problem for 6 months now where my forum icon wont show up.

I just had a look at your user profile, and I believe I know what the problem is - you've confused the concept of a Profile Photo and an Avatar (A Profile Photo can only be seen in your user profile, while an Avatar / user icon is what gets shown under your username and next to your public posts).

To add an Avatar:

- Go to Settings on the top right corner of any forums page

- Under the My Settings toolbar on the bottom left, select Edit Avatar

- Follow the instructions on the Edit Avatar page
